website_summaries.verdict: Clear plugs that do not detract from your decor.
pros: Made from a flexible material that is still strong
Very hard for kids to take off
cons: While they are made from a clear material, they still tend to be easy to see in your outlets

customer_reviews.title: Not an effective product.
customer_reviews.text: These only slow my 2 year down by about 3 seconds. Prettt useless, the plastic is too smooth so he can pull them right out with his tiny finger.
customer_reviews.author: Nichoals Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but are removed by a toddler very easily
customer_reviews.text: These do the job, they plug the outlet to prevent a kid from putting stuff in the outlet. HOWEVER, they lack any "friction" surfaces, to help make it a little more difficult to remove by a toddler. My 12 month old is easily removing them with zero effort. If there was some "tabs/tangs" on the part that inserts into the outlet to provide some resistance to removing them, that would at least make it harder for them to remove. As it stands these are useless because they are so easily removed by a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Work well, good quality plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about how easy these would be to remove for my child based on some other reviews. I watched him attack a outlet for 2 minutes and he didn't even come remotely close to being able to pull them out of the socket. My second concern was the quality of the plugs, if they were cheap the prongs could easily snap off in my outlet upon removal. However, these seem to be made pretty well, and after continuously removing one it never even cracked. Definitely going to order some more for the rest of my house, and worth spending the few extra $$ over the super cheap ones on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Warner

customer_reviews.title: BLOCKS DRAFTS WELL
customer_reviews.text: I got these to block drafts coming in through the holes in the wall plate of unoccupied outlets. Not only do they work well, but they are barely noticeable because of the clear plastic, flexible, but quite sturdy. I am very happy with these. If you're looking to block drafts in the winter, don't hesitate to use these. Beats the pieces of tan masking tape I had covering the unused outlet holes. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Birch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, useful plugs
customer_reviews.text: These plugs are always useful when there are children in the house and there is a concern for one of them sticking something into an outlet that could be very dangerous. However, the reason I bought these is to use with Christmas lights outdoors. With there being exposure to water outdoors, I use these to fill unused portions of the wiring, and then, I cover with electrical tape. In some cases, where there is no threat of rain or snow reaching the wiring much, I omit the tape. These are sturdy, durable and extend plenty over the outlet areas. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: Work Well!
customer_reviews.text: Although these are billed as something to use for child safety, I use them reduce drafts in unused outlets in exterior walls. They work well for that purpose and are pretty unobtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Supt

customer_reviews.title: My kids will not get electrocuted!
customer_reviews.text: Covers the outlet and is not easy for curious children to remove; my 1-year-old quickly gives up and moves on and my 3-year-old doesn't even bother with it now. Clear enough that the outlet doesn't even look covered at a glance, which I really like. Great quality plastic, bends without snapping, tough enough that they can be reused over and over. Great price for the quality and quantity received. Well done Jool Baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst ever. The prong part breaks easily. Cheaply made. My baby pucks them right out of the outlet. Any other brand i ever bought was difficult to remove these slide right out and my baby instantly puts them in her mouth. At least im getting cardio doing that. If i could give it zero stars i would.
customer_reviews.author: babylove

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INSULATOR AND CHILD DETERRANT
customer_reviews.text: I use these in conjunction with the foam gasket covers to give added insulation to the windy days. They fit tight, which is good, but takes a screw driver to remove them. Children will definitely not be able to remove them. I use them solely for insulation purposes.
customer_reviews.author: BobCooks4U

customer_reviews.title: Inpossible for babies, easy for parents.
customer_reviews.text: They don't look or feel cheap. They'll last and they don't stick out like a sore thumb. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Family

customer_reviews.title: do thier job, but there are better options out there
customer_reviews.text: These bend after they've been put in and removed a few times and my 15 month old can remove them. Also, because they are clear and it's possible to see through them they don't do anything to deter him from his interest in outlets. There are other options out there that are opaque and have buttons that lock them in place (mommy's helper plug covers I think they're called) and I'd suggest those first for sure. More expensive but worth it. Some people don't like those because they're hard to get off once in the wall but that's kind of the point :).
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly over outlets
customer_reviews.text: These outlet covers fit perfectly over the outlets in my home. They’re easy to remove without having to worry about tiny fingers getting them off. I like that they are see through- they aren’t noticeable like the white ones are. I also think the amount that comes in the package is just right.
customer_reviews.author: letitbe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these for my high school classroom to try to limit locations where the sophomores can charge phones (mostly because kids have been caught charging e-cigs at school, so I don't trust them to use outlets without supervision). They work fine--just enough of a deterrent for them to know that I really don't want them to use the outlets. Not sure how they'd work for younger kids, but I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This protect pets too!
customer_reviews.text: we just adopted two small kittens that have a bit of Bobcat in them, so you can imagine how active and curious they are. Well, these have stopped them form putting wet noses in to sockets and little paws too. We are all set for kitten safety thanks to these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Khakijo

customer_reviews.title: OUtlets with usb
customer_reviews.text: These are a pretty basic item that has been around for years. They are clear plastic not the opaque white ones I am used to seeing. The seem very study. It could be to get a clear product they need to use a higher quality of resin. The only issue is that I now have several outlets with USB outlets built in. I didn’t think of it when I placed my order. I’m not concerned with the USB being uncovered. I think they have a very low power output. But the plus covers the usb just enough that it can’t be used. I guess it’s time for a better mouse trap
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Best outlet covers I have tried. They fit exactly with no overlay so a child can’t pull them out like some others I have tried. The smooth finish is good too so a small hand can’t get a grip on it. They were very easy to use. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nevaeh

customer_reviews.title: Maybe get the white ones and don't leave them on the ground
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are clear so it doesn't look like they're there at all, but it also helps draw the baby's attention to them. Also, they seem a little easy to remove. I thought she was pulling them out but it was her father forgetting to put them back in after vacuuming. They still come out very easily, though. We had a scare where her father left one on the ground and she had put it in her mouth. The prongs on it just barely kept it from going down her throat and quite possibly saved her life in a different way than intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Needed for raccoon baby
customer_reviews.text: We all know raccoons can get in the far more worse trouble than a baby so I'm pleased to say these things work really good she cannot pull them out of the socket and it's keeping my raccon from being shocked . I would say this is a must-have if you got to put something in your sockets it comes with a good amount to in The Price is Right it's kind of weird baby proofing your house for a raccoon but hey that's what it's all about safety for the babies thank you for supplying them and shipping them in a QuickTime
customer_reviews.author: Meadow Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a visit by grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: This review is written by Dianne Zalewski: Our toddler grandson is walking. Everywhere. Quickly. We ordered enough of these to cover every outlet during his visit, and he tried to pull many of them off --- unsuccessfully. When the grandson left, we needed to pull the covers off to store them in a bag until the next visit. I learned why he was unsuccessful. The covers are difficult to remove; that is a good thing with toddlers but a challenge for elderly grandparents. All-in-all, I would use them again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Zalewski

customer_reviews.title: Also good for Outdoor Holiday Lights
customer_reviews.text: People that do elaborate outdoor lighting displays use these to discourage rain from entering unused sockets and tripping GFCI's. That can be as many as 2 per string of lights (Stacking socket and the far end socket). These are good value for this task
customer_reviews.author: TheDucks

customer_reviews.title: Fits most outlets..
customer_reviews.text: These are okay for some of our outlets. Some outlets we have which they all look alike, this can easily be taken out by our baby. And on the other side of the room it cannot so I cannot say this is a 5 star product because it only fits most outlets even though my outlets appear to be the same I guess they aren’t! Not necessarily the creators fault I suppose but anyway.. the side of the room is my baby can pull these out we taped over with some clear tape as well, oh well  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Have a baby on the way soon and these were exactly what I needed to babyproof our house. The plugs fit in tight and even cover the ground holes. They also are not easy to pull out most likely would need a plastic knife or card to pull them out. If I need more I definitely wouldn't hesitate to buy more! Our new baby's safety is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keeps my 9 month old away from them because he discovered he can’t take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hudson

customer_reviews.title: They have one job to do, and they do it well.
customer_reviews.text: They have one job to do, and they do it well. They arrived in the mail, and within about 5 minutes I used all 32. Popped them right in all my dangerous uncovered sockets, and BAM!: Children safe. They are just hard enough to get out as they are easy to get out if you use the right tools. Tools being maybe the prong of your electronic device's plug. Easy to remove, but not so easy for kids to remove. I doubt my kids will even notice they are there, because they are clear and can't be seen well from far away.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Do the job!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tried to remove any of these covers yet as I haven’t had the need. But they go in just a tad bit snug which I would want because I would want them to go in loose otherwise my crafty LO would easily pull them out the sockets. But a good old school product for protecting LOs. Came with a good amount as well. Would purchase this again if I need more, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla daniel

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with outlet covers. A good price delivered when promised. I would buy from these people again. After installing and thinking I had done something good my 10 month old granddaughter can just pull them right out. They don't fit right enough.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: does what we need
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this in all our outlets. When I needed to remove one to use the outlet, it took a little bit of prying, which is what I wanted. I was able to use my fingernails so no other tools were involved. I prefer that it takes some effort on my part to remove than have my granddaughter easily take them out.
customer_reviews.author: Windchime

customer_reviews.title: Product is as stated.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that the delivery driver stated that the product was delivered directly to resident. It was delivered and left at my front door as I wanted. Other than that, the product was on time and will be used to cap the outlets so baby can’t get into them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Douglas (Atlanta)

customer_reviews.title: Great price, work great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These types of products are simple design and simple to produce, so you would be surprised at the quality difference between the brands. Some are too cheap and break off easily, others are too engineered or stiff and are difficult to install or remove. This product seems to be the sweet spot right in the middle. They look good, are good quality, install easy and remove nicely without breaking. The clear plastic is much more aesthetically pleasing than the milky or solid versions. My 2 year old has attempted to remove them, gave up and lost interest immediately. That's all the review you really need as a parent.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Baby Proof
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's clear and the baby can still see the holes. We trained her and now she does not touch outlets when she sees one unplugged. The white ones work okay too but I prefer the clear ones. I do have to use both hands to get it out not to hurt my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: They were born to cover outlets
customer_reviews.text: These sturdy little plastic covers do their job. Never seen outlet covers perform so well. It's like they were made to cover outlets. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Should not be described as “clear”.
customer_reviews.text: I have some clear outlet covers my daughter gave me, but needed more, so I ordered these. These are not clear. They are cloudy. Also, they are not as thick as the other ones I have and they are not as easy to remove. I’m disappointed. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: D. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Not baby proof!
customer_reviews.text: These outlet covers are NOT childproof! My 10 month old can easily take them off the outlet, and they have made outlets even more exciting for her. If you are looking for something for child proofing, these are not for you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not Just for Baby proofing
customer_reviews.text: Plug covers are not just for baby proofing and safety. A friend recommended plug covers as an easy way to prevent heat loss from electrical outlets located on exterior walls. The covers are sturdy and easy to use, and can be removed during warmer months or when the outlet is in use. This is a simple and inexpensive way to prevent heat loss. The 32-pack is a good value; and shipping was quick. I will be ordering another 32-pack to insulate the remaining outlets in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Goalymom

customer_reviews.title: Choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: Got this today- went to put them in and I could VERY easily remove them! Definitely NOT safe and presents a choking hazard on top of electrocution hazard from the socket itself. Immediately returning. Don't even waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Mary

customer_reviews.title: They cover outlets - yay!
customer_reviews.text: They cover outlets. Nothing fancy, but that's the point right? They are easy enough to remove as an adult but I think still hard enough for toddler. I like that they are clear. From across the room, it isn't obvious all the outlets are covered.
customer_reviews.author: zaria1066

customer_reviews.title: They almost fall out on their own
customer_reviews.text: They fall right out. I don't know how anyone gave these greater than 1 star. They go in easily and come right out easily. My son takes them out and chews on them. So mad I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kaelin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Second child problems...my daughter is fascinated by electrical outlets. We never needed these plug covers with our son, but literally have these in every outlet of our home with her!
customer_reviews.author: ica1080

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Do the Job
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these because my 6 month old is already trying to get his fingers in the electrical outlets. These Plug covers work great, easy to install and you can't even tell they are there. They do not stand out so they are great all over the house in every room.
customer_reviews.author: Maty

customer_reviews.title: Do not Use! Too Easily Removed.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase! These socket covers should be designed to fit snuggly into each socket so that a 2 year old cannot easily pull them out. This product too easily slides in and can be pulled out easily...almost falls out. This is a hazard and I would not recommend for anyone wishing to protect their children. UPDATE: JOOL Reached out and their Customer Service Department took care of the problem. Excellent response! I upgraded my review from 1 Star to 4 Stars as a result
customer_reviews.author: David A. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I cant even say the do the job. The whole purpose of these is so that little ones can't access the outlet. Well my 1yr old takes these off like its nothing. So they're pretty useless...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly nonconvential looking power outlet covers
customer_reviews.text: These outlet covers work perfectly well, but I don't really like how they look. They are slightly asymmetrically shaped which kind of bugs me. One of them broke, but that didn't matter since the package had a lot more than I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: easy for kids to pick out of outlet
customer_reviews.text: watched our 14 month old granddaughter pick out the cover and put it in her mouth. We had to tape shut the outlets to protect her little fingers from going into the sockets. "child proof" no way.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: snug fit and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: Work well to block plugs, no danger of them falling out on their own. Just difficult enough to remove that kids would have trouble. Only drawback is several have cracked during removal due to pivoting them against the plug faceplate during removal rather than pulling them straight out. Still work fine when cracked.
customer_reviews.author: phdsquared

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: My toddlers can get these off in 2 seconds. Not quality like others I have paid less for. In the garbage for choking hazard and not protecting from the outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Elb

customer_reviews.title: Baby learning to crawl and curious
customer_reviews.text: They were great at first, but then after a while they stopped staying in and a couple of them broke in my outlets. Which are big fire hazards. Unfortunately it was passed the refund date. These go in and STAY in, my daughter can not get them out of the socket, which is a relief as everything is going into her mouth these days.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M

customer_reviews.title: They work as they're intended but...
customer_reviews.text: Product work just as they are suppose to except they come out of the outlets very easy. They easy to install and very easy to uninstall, which is not good at all. I have a two year old and he is able to get them out of the stocket in less than a second. They're very flimsy so they slip right on out I try them on multiple sockets and they just seem to go in and pop right out so I'm not sure if I got a bad batch or they are just designed for decoration
customer_reviews.author: Alan M Gil

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great
customer_reviews.text: Obviously super easy to install, relatively easy for an adult to remove which is nice and I really like that they’re clear, you can barely tell they’re plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are clear, so it interferes less with decor, and that they are easy for adults to place/remove, but not the babies. Most other brands are too hard to remove. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you think they are
customer_reviews.text: I use these to block unused sockets on my outdoor plugs and they fit the bill perfectly. They also may protect your baby, but I ha emt done any testing there. Can recommend to protect you outdoor (not in the weather) plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Lydell Moore

customer_reviews.title: My 8 month old figured out how to remove them
customer_reviews.text: They’re doing what they should, except my 8 month old is peeling them out of their place and putting them in her mouth making them officially more dangerous than the outlet itself.
customer_reviews.author: Rok Hamze

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure you have a fingernail to get the plug loosened when removing , I guess a butter knife works but that may defeat the purpose of safety! (Lol)
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Only real issue with these is that they should be narrower in order to fit in side by side plugs (surge protectors and power strips). I am able to trim them with scissors to fit. They are a little difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Ichino

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and blend right in.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They blend right in with the outlet and you can bearly tell that they are there, I would prefer them to be a little tighter (hard to remove) but it is not a deal breaker, and my 9 month old can't remove them so that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Zachology101

customer_reviews.title: Looks aesthetically appealing
customer_reviews.text: The outlet plug-ins look great around the house! I'm wanting to switch my outlet covers eventually, so I'm glad that they are clear. The one thing that I am concerned about is that they are pretty easy to remove. I don't want them easy to remove. We'll see if my problem-solving and persistent toddler will decide he wants to try pulling them out. So far, he's left them alone.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to install, and remove (when you need the outlet). Have yet to see if my son can actually take them out himself (almost 2 years old), but they're clear and very hard to see. It's a classy look, and simple to install and remove. Just what I would want.
customer_reviews.author: Tamilyn Kaaekuahiwi

customer_reviews.title: Keep Your Fingernails Intact!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put in, but more importantly very easy to take out! Not something that a child can easily do, but something that an adult can easily do. You will NOT be losing fingernails over these.
customer_reviews.author: Tobe Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put in and easy(ish) to pull them out
customer_reviews.text: They're really easy to put in so they're also easier to pull out in comparison to previous covers I've used. Downside may be if you have an infant they may be able to pull them out easier than if you got the kind that are annoying difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! You can’t hardly tell they are on the outlets, easy to put on, kids can’t pull them off but easier for adult to pull them off than some other kinds I have seen. I ordered one pack just to see if I liked them and immediately ordered 2 more packs once they came in to be able to cover everything in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality clear outlet covers!
customer_reviews.text: They slide in easily and need a bit of prying to get out ... exactly what you need to protect your child! I love that they are clear. You hardly notice them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi L. Markham

customer_reviews.title: Outlet plug covers
customer_reviews.text: They worked great. Clear so they don't draw attention. They take a little effort to get off but that is what you need if you don't want a child to get to the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Better than Cheap Alternatives
customer_reviews.text: The cheap versions are terribly hard to get off and feel like cheap plastic. These slide in and out with ease. The tab is also great.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Easy for toddler to pull out of outlet
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 year old has no trouble pulling these out of the outlets. The brand we used in the past were much better for child-proofing.
customer_reviews.author: Cr8forever

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Using to stop drafts coming in on my exterior walls. I can notice a difference when the covers are in and there is no longer a draft pulling into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: It works with ease!
customer_reviews.text: It was good to buy a item from online and have it work with ease. I can’t attest to the durability yet as I just got them. I ordered another pack as I was so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Can be easily taken out of the outlet
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. The covers look great and are easily put into the outlet. The issue with these is that these can be easily taken out of the outlet, which is not how it should be. In-fact, it’s so easy that these can be removed with a pinky finger with little to no pressure. Comparing to other similar covers we have, these look great but does not do the job well. Never installed
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Svet

customer_reviews.title: Less noticeable then most and work well
customer_reviews.text: These look much better then the large white ones, they dont attract my childrens attention and stay in place well. I do have a loose plug that needs easily drops plug ins that these will come out of easily but fit securely in all my other plugs. I'm pleased with how they work and look.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Never using another plug cover but this one
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. Easy to install, but can be a little difficult to remove if you dont have nails. I lole these over others because you dont even notice that it's there and still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: ZACCHEUS ARNOLD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed at a great  price
customer_reviews.text: Outlet covers are not high tech. So not an awful lot to say..... They arrived as promised. They ARE really clear, which is nice. Easily inserted. I ordered them to prep the house for the arrival of a 15 month old visitor. Now I'm set!
customer_reviews.author: karph54

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter who is moving into a house with 3 children. I know she is happy to have gotten these.
customer_reviews.author: Beachwalker

customer_reviews.title: Loose and poor fot
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s my outlets, but this thing does not go in tight enough... my 1 yr old will eventually grow and remove easily
customer_reviews.author: zazel678

customer_reviews.title: Can be removed with zero effort
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy these. I could pull them out easily with no effort from my pinkie finger. Kind of defeats the purpose, yeah? Children will have no trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent! The plastic is so clear they are hardly noticeable. It plugs in and can be removed easy enough by an adult while having enough grab to prevent a toddler from pulling it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jimme

customer_reviews.title: Not safe enough. It gets out too easily
customer_reviews.text: Not safe enough. My 7 months baby was able to take it out just by touching the plug cover. Luckily I was at her side.
customer_reviews.author: JGGJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and was looking for at a great cost. Recommended for parents of young and adventurous children.
customer_reviews.author: Windsofnirvana

customer_reviews.title: keeping grandchildren safe is crucial
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is crawling and almost walking, so plug covers are a necessity. These plug covers were a good price, so they were my logical choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Deb

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Done
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I discussed letting the baby learn about dangerous items the hard way as it might save us time and effort in the long run but we decided to be responsible parents and not allow him electrocute himself. These safety caps are exactly what you'd expect, and I'm sure will work just fine in keeping tiny hands from inserting objects into sockets. However, they do nothing to add protection from our indoor shark tank.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus E. Turnbo

customer_reviews.title: Good for kitten proofing the house!
customer_reviews.text: We have a kitten that was very interested in our electric outlets, so we ordered these. I can't review on their use for human babies because I don't have kids, but they work great for fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Richardson

customer_reviews.title: good winterizing product. Stops air leaks
customer_reviews.text: i bought these not because they keep children from sticking their finger in the sockets. I bought them to assist with air flow in my house, to keep hot air in and cold air out.
customer_reviews.author: Kappaphi153

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These pretty much fit the product description. The plastic is good quality and they fit well on my outlets (don't slip out), but can be removed easily enough using my finger nails.
customer_reviews.author: R. Laracuente

customer_reviews.title: Outlet Plug Covers
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I was looking for. The price was very reasonable for a pack of 32 pieces. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product to protect my very young grandchildren. It covers the plugs and when you install them you can seldom can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosita

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and harder for my daughter (18 months old) go remove than the more expensive safety first brand! Plus harder to spot these!
customer_reviews.author: Averyrlong

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and attractive
customer_reviews.text: We all buy outlet covers for protection first, but it's nice that these are also clear, so they don't look ugly. They are easy to insert into the outlet plugs. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Slope Biker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love those outlet plugs- i had purchased other brands and was so disappointed. So happy i found these great plugs. They are skeek, and not difficult to take off but not too easy for a toddler to take off.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what i thought these would be
customer_reviews.text: pretty simple purchase; we needed outlet covers to keep our visiting grandchild safe and thay ese worked great! clear, easy to install and stay in the outlet fine reasonable price and just what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: KitzE

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: These covers are a good bargain. We had enough to cover three big rooms. They were easy to install and easy to remove when you need to use the socket. The clear ones are great because they are not noticeable and do not attract baby's attention. I am planning on purchasing more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmichigan

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for baby proofing outlets.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these completely cover all 3 holes in each outlet. They’re slim & clear so they blend in easily with the paint/wall & are sort of invisible as opposed to being bigger/thicker or solid white. They sit flush against the outlet, my daughter can not remove them but they’re not too difficult for us to remove if we need to use the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Is too easy to remove. My 1 year old can take them off.
customer_reviews.text: These fall right out of the outlet. My 1 year old quickly and easily pulled them right back out..
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Shriver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: Just love these. Easy to put in and replace. They were effective for my kids, and now grandkids
customer_reviews.author: ARTIST49

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & remove
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for a house with a baby/toddler all over the place. Easy to install and remove and keep baby fingers out of the socket.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree G.

customer_reviews.title: Adult proof
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really effective and I find it difficult as a an adult to remove it. My daughter is not getting shocked today.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: So easy to take them out
customer_reviews.text: Still thinking whether I should return these or not. It is so easy to take them out of the outlet. My daughter hasn’t done it yet just because she hasn’t reached one yet. I’m waiting to see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia

customer_reviews.title: choking hazard!
customer_reviews.text: easy to get these out of the plug and they are so small that its a choking hazard... seriously useless!
customer_reviews.author: Coxe

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: The covers are very clear. I almost can’t tell if they’re on the outlets or not which is pretty cool because I was never a fan of the all white covers They’re sturdy and great material
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perez

customer_reviews.title: Blocks cold air entering through unused external wall outlets.
customer_reviews.text: Placed into unused outlets on external walls as a simple fix to block cold air entering. They are unobtrusive and very easy to place or remove.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Not childproof—Hazardous
customer_reviews.text: Not childproof. My 8 month old son ripped it right off & put it in his mouth
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Not Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are made of flexible material, were easy to install. When installed they are semi-transparent and do not look like the cheap plastic ones of several decades ago. We like them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These plug covers were exactly what I was looking for as I'm trying to baby-proof my home.
customer_reviews.author: L. Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for covering outlets. I like that they’re clear so you don’t even notice them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

product_meta.title: Outlet Plug Covers (32 Pack) Clear Child Proof Electrical Protector Safety Caps - Jool Baby
feature_bullets: The best outlet plugs to keep children away from electric hazards, keeping babies safe.
Our outlet covers are ULTRA clear to blend in to your home while keeping your home a safer place
These outlet plugs are simple to install - simply insert the safety caps in the unused outlets, plug protector will fit firmly in outlet
Helps protect babies from placing dangerous objects in unused outlets, it's a must for all parents. You can also use these covers as socket sealers to prevent cold drafts in the winter!
